mapper.sql: id, login_name, real_name, password, password_salt, areaid, status, creater, operator, createtime, operatortime
mapper.select: select u.*,t.roleids,t2.areasids,t.roleName, t2.areaName from sys_user u left join ( select userid,GROUP_CONCAT(id) as roleids,GROUP_CONCAT(roleName) as roleName from (select r.*,ur.userid from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.roleid ) t group by userid)t on u.id = t.userid left join( select userid,GROUP_CONCAT(id) as areasids,GROUP_CONCAT(areas_name) as areaName from (select a.*,ua.userid from sys_areas a left join sys_user_area ua on a.id = ua.areaid) t group by userid) t2 on u.id = t2.userid where u.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (
select u.*,t.roleids,t2.areasids,t.roleName, t2.areaName, CONCAT(",",t2.areasids,",") as areasidsCondition from sys_user u left join ( select userid,GROUP_CONCAT(id) as roleids,GROUP_CONCAT(roleName) as roleName from (select r.*,ur.userid from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.roleid ) t group by userid)t on u.id = t.userid left join( select userid,GROUP_CONCAT(id) as areasids,GROUP_CONCAT(areas_name) as areaName from (select a.*,ua.userid from sys_areas a left join sys_user_area ua on a.id = ua.areaid) t group by userid) t2 on u.id = t2.userid where u.status='1'
and u.login_name like CONCAT('%',#{loginName},'%')
and u.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
) t where 1=1
and LOCATE(CONCAT(',',#{areasids},','),t.areasidsCondition)>0

select u.*,t.roleids,t2.areasids,t.roleName, t2.areaName from sys_user u left join ( select userid,GROUP_CONCAT(id) as roleids,GROUP_CONCAT(roleName) as roleName from (select r.*,ur.userid from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.roleid ) t group by userid)t on u.id = t.userid left join( select userid,GROUP_CONCAT(id) as areasids,GROUP_CONCAT(areas_name) as areaName from (select a.*,ua.userid from sys_areas a left join sys_user_area ua on a.id = ua.areaid) t group by userid) t2 on u.id = t2.userid where u.login_name=#{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u.status='1'

select DISTINCT u.* from sys_user u,sys_user_area ua,sys_areas a,sys_user_role ur, sys_role r,sys_role_permission rp,sys_permission p where u.id = ua.userid and ua.areaid = a.id and u.id = ur.userid and ur.roleid = r.id and r.id = rp.roleid and rp.permissionid = p.id and p.available='1' and p.percode=#{permisscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.id=#{areid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
